properties.body:
NORTH ATLANTIC.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ IN 26-00.7N 041-29.5W
AT 021753Z AUG. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A
SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO RCC NORFOLK,
TELEX: 127775, INMARSAT-C: 430370670, PHONE: 757 398 6231,
FAX: 757 398 6392, E-MAIL: D05-SMB-D5CC@USCG.MIL.
